#summary Example: How to load a queue in a hurry
#labels Phase-Deploy

== Load queue quickly ==

=== Context ===
You want to generate a Curly queue without declaring a plethora of variables

=== Code ===
{{{
curlyqueue_t* queue = curlyqueue_create_queue();

void* value;

/* create q of 5 elems */
int values[] = {1,2,3,4,5};
int i;
for( i = 0; i < 5; i++ ){
    value = (void*)&values[i];
    curlyqueue_enqueue( queue, value );
}
...
curlyqueue_delete_queue( queue );
}}}

=== Result ===
You end up with a queue of five elements: _5,4,3,2,1_
